scripts.build: yarn workspace @tutimbeta/headless build && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/fields build && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/types build
scripts.pkg:patch: yarn workspace @tutimbeta/types version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/headless version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/fields version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn version --patch  --no-git-tag-version
scripts.pkg:tag: git add . && git commit -m v${npm_package_version} && git push && git tag v${npm_package_version} && git push --tags
scripts.pkg:deploy: yarn workspace @tutimbeta/types pkg && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/headless pkg && yarn workspace @tutimbeta/fields pkg
scripts.pkg: yarn pkg:patch && yarn pkg:tag && yarn pkg:deploy
